properties.name: spring.application.name
properties.description: Application name used in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: spring.application.version
properties.description: Application version used in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: spring.application.description
properties.description: Application description used in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: spring.application.team.name
properties.description: Team name used in OpenAPI documentation contact information.

properties.name: spring.application.team.email
properties.description: Team email used in OpenAPI documentation contact information.

properties.name: spring.application.team.url
properties.description: Team URL used in OpenAPI documentation contact information.

properties.name: spring.application.license.name
properties.description: License name used in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: spring.application.license.url
properties.description: License URL used in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: openapi.security.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable security definitions in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: openapi.servers.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable server definitions in OpenAPI documentation.

properties.name: http-request-logging.enabled
properties.description: Whether HTTP request logging is enabled for auditing purposes.

properties.name: http-request-logging.include-headers
properties.description: Whether to include request and response headers in logs.

properties.name: http-request-logging.include-request-body
properties.description: Whether to include request body in logs.

properties.name: http-request-logging.include-response-body
properties.description: Whether to include response body in logs.

properties.name: http-request-logging.max-body-size
properties.description: Maximum size of request/response body to log in bytes.

properties.name: http-request-logging.log-level
properties.description: Log level for HTTP request logging (DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR).

properties.name: http-request-logging.include-query-params
properties.description: Whether to include query parameters in logs.
